mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, U.USER_NAME, G.GENDER_NAME, U.USER_BIRTH, U.USER_TEL, T.SIGNUP_DATE FROM USERINFO U LEFT JOIN USERCODE UC ON U.USER_CODE = UC.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN TEACHERSIGNUP T ON UC.USER_CODE = T.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN SCHOOL S ON T.SCHOOL_CODE = S.SCHOOL_CODE LEFT JOIN TSIGNUPCHECK TCK ON T.T_SIGNUP_CODE = TCK.T_SIGNUP_CODE LEFT JOIN GENDER G ON U.GENDER_CODE = G.GENDER_CODE WHERE S.SCHOOL_CODE = #{schoolCode} AND TCK.T_SIGNUP_CODE IS NULL
